page.title: 17Tibberton F.C.
page.content:
In l980 Tibberton Football Club were in the{Wellington league.} Now in l985 they are in a{County Premier {division.}The league had eleven foot- ball teams and they come from Madeley, Ironbridge, and Wellington.
The matches Tibbeton play at home are played on{Tibberton playing field. The season is from September to April.
There is usually a{meeting once a {month.}Tibberton football team also need{money}to keep the club going. The club has to pay for certain things, for instance, the{hire of the pitch which was Â£6-30 per game, paid to the Council.{Referee fees}were Â£3-50 per game. Now the fees are Â£l0 for the pitch and Â£6 for the referee.
